actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain changes in the loan and purchase program for the 1974-75 peanut crop which the Department of Agriculture is contemplating shall not be made.

summary.text: Provides that the loan and purchase program for the 1974-1975 peanut crop shall not be subject to change, by regulation or otherwise, from the program as it was administered for the 1973 crop.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain changes in the loan and purchase program for the 1974-75 peanut crop which the Department of Agriculture is contemplating shall not be made.
